ygData.subject: Re: Silly me (various topics)
ygData.msgSnippet: as far as i can remember, alliance will just make someone who wont sell to you, sell to you (ie, makes dubious into indifferent to you). at lvl 20 or 24 you
ygData.messageBody:
as far as i can remember, alliance will just make someone who wont sell to
you, sell to you (ie, makes dubious into indifferent to you). at lvl 20 or
24 you get sympathetic aura, which raises chaaisma, and hence you get
better prices and sellbacks. i have found that anyone who looks upon you
warmly (And nothing less) will give you better prices that anyone else.

Qorona of the Volition Guild, 19th lvl enchanter on Cazic-Thule

>
> Alliance : It never says in the rules it is the spell's purpose. Please
>state your sources. At this moment I have to test if it helps on
quests/talks.
>


-------------------
tim borrelli
computer character animator and crackhead extraordinaire
